definition: cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: Thinking critically can enable one to analyze problems insightfully.
sentences.chinese: 批判性思考能够使你在分析问题时富有洞察力。

sentences.english: Nothing is more terrible than activity without insight.
sentences.chinese: 最可帕的事莫如做任何活动，没有洞察力。

sentences.english: For the vision of one man lends not its wings to another man.
sentences.chinese: 因为一个人的洞察力不能将其羽翼借给另一个人。

sentences.english: Discernment and analysis must lead to conclusions and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 洞察力和分析一定要产生结论和想法。

sentences.english: Precognition is a form of clairvoyance.
sentences.chinese: 预知是超人的洞察力的一种形式。

sentences.english: He was a man of deep insight.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个很有洞察力的人。

sentences.english: His painting rose to a expressive ness and revealed a shrewder insight.
sentences.chinese: 他的画富有一种新的表达力显示出更敏锐的洞察力。

sentences.english: An umpire must be an entirely disinterested but keen observer.
sentences.chinese: 一个裁判员必须公正无私而且具有敏锐的洞察力。

sentences.english: A politician has to have good insight as well as common sense.
sentences.chinese: 一个政治家一定要有洞察力及常识。

sentences.english: It appears your perceptive powers know no bounds.
sentences.chinese: 看来妳得洞察力真是不可限量呢。

sentences.english: Yet spouses do not lack insight.
sentences.chinese: 然而配偶们并不缺乏洞察力。

sentences.english: The breed is highly intelligent and perceptive and also very independent.
sentences.chinese: 大白熊具有高度的智商和洞察力，并且也非常独立。

sentences.english: The road to success is full of adversity from which we can gain significant insight.
sentences.chinese: 成功之路充满着来源于我们意义重大洞察力的不幸。

sentences.english: Wisdom is the human ability of observation, a character a compound of many things .
sentences.chinese: 智慧是人类的洞察力，是品格，是众多事物的合成体。

sentences.english: Kid's aren't dumb. They are deadly perceptive and highly inquisitive.
sentences.chinese: 小孩并不笨，他们有极强的洞察力和好奇心。

sentences.english: For her Minerva aided and endowed with courage and discernment.
sentences.chinese: 因为密涅瓦帮助她，给了她勇气和洞察力。

definition: sixth sense (i.e. intuition, premonition, telepathy etc)
